text: Hanspeter Latour (born 4 June 1947 in Thun) is a Swiss football manager and former goalkeeper. == Coach career == He has vast experience as a manager, having coached at the professional level for over thirty years in both Germany and his native Switzerland. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Swiss footballers Category:FC Thun players Category:BSC Young Boys players Category:1. FC Köln managers Category:Grasshopper Club Zürich managers Category:FC Thun managers Category:FC Wil managers Category:People from Thun Category:Swiss football managers
title: Hanspeter Latour
